com.scottbyrns.ml.neural
Interface Neuron

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultNeuron
public interface Neuron
extends java.io.Serializable

An artificial neuron that is an abstraction of biological neurons in the form of a linear threshold model.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Scott Byrns Date: Nov 10, 2010 Time: 5:33:08 PM
